item.description:
Are you as excited to get back on your skis and boards as we are?! Kick off the ski season at Royale for the annual BLIZZARD - Boston's premiere Ski Season Kickoff Party filled with winter enthusiasts, ski exhibitors, lift ticket giveaways, tons of swag and partying all night long!
Goodie bags with lift tickets & deals from Sugarbush, Crotched Mountain, Bolton Valley and Wachusett to first 500 guests
Apres ski appetizers, snow bars & shot skis
The Good Life's DJ Knife spinning today's hottest hits
Meet with top ski resorts & retailers
Hosts: Sue Brady from Mix 104.1, Earle Pitt & Kimberly Walleston of the Mountain Report and Dirty Water TV
Grand Prize- 5 night ski vacation to Whistler/Blackcomb for 2!
Thousands of dollars in prizes - ski gear, free trips and lift tickets
Date: Wednesday, November 7th
Time: 5:30-9:30
Individual Price: $15
BSSC Member Price: $10
At Door Sales: $20 for all if space allows
How To Register:

Click Here!

Â
item.name: BSSC Blizzard
